title: Persuasion (1995 film)
summary: Persuasion is a 1995 period drama film directed by Roger Michell and based on Jane Austen's 1817 novel of the same name. In her theatrical film debut, Amanda Root stars as protagonist Anne Elliot, while Ciar√°n Hinds plays her romantic interest, Captain Frederick Wentworth.
